reporting_framework.notes_reference: Note 3: Basis of Preparation and Presentation of Financial statements
discrepancies_identified: Entity refers to 'International Accounting Standards (IAS) as adopted by ICAB' rather than IFRS. IAS 18 used instead of IFRS 15 for revenue recognition.
reporting_framework.reason_of_the_status: The entity states compliance with IFRS but uses outdated IAS standards and references ICAB adoption rather than full IFRS.

applicable_regulators.reason_for_non_compliance: Entity is not listed on stock exchange
applicable_regulators.reason_of_the_status: BSEC regulations apply to listed companies only

applicable_regulators.reason_for_non_compliance: Uses outdated IAS standards instead of current IFRS
specific_disclosures_found: Statement of IFRS compliance in audit report
applicable_regulators.reason_of_the_status: Auditor asserts IFRS compliance but entity uses IAS standards

applicable_regulators.regulator_name: Registrar of Joint Stock Companies and Firms (RJSC)
applicable_regulators.reason_of_the_status: Properly registered as private company limited by shares
Comprehensive tax disclosures with TDS details
Proper disclosure of banking relationships and borrowings

regulatory_landscape.overall_regulatory_assessment: Partially Compliant. While meeting basic statutory requirements, the entity uses outdated accounting standards inconsistent with full IFRS compliance as claimed.
